about_the_game:
Ever wanted to relax and play a Monster Taming / Creature Collecting game? Collect resources, build an island, move in guests and begin to craft household items? Sit down, and begin to relax with Pixacrea Island! As a new scientist you are tasked with helping in the discovery of a brand new island that has never been touched by mankind. Your goal is simple, collect as many Pixacrea from the island as you can for research, and begin to build the island to help aid you in the research. Choose your starting Pixacrea, and battle each Pixacrea you face to capture it's shard in the name of science, design parts of the island however you'd like, customize your character with unique skins to choose from, as well as craft, build, and buy items for your home!

We mentioned skins, and purchasable items, but there are ABSOLUTELY ZERO MTX in Pixacrea Island. None, Zip, Natta, every item, ever skin, every thing in the game will all be purchasable using in game currency, through achievements, quests, and crafting! Sorry to those who live to swipe your CCs, you can buy our physical TCG if you'd like to give us your money, but hiding in game content behind a physical paywall is something that shouldn't be justifiable in video games.


- Firema - Waterma - Earthma - Billy





Pixacrea Island is all about relaxation, calming gameplay, and most of all, enjoying the game how you wish to enjoy it. With that in mind, we start the game off allowing you to decide what you'd like to have enabled in your gameplay. Not a fan of Monster Taming / Creature Collecting turn based battles? Remove them for your game. Does our time system stress you out? Shut er' down. Though with the time system, it will be there, however the new day will not progress until YOU decide when you'd like to sleep.


- Slitha

Pixacrea Island is a relaxing social & life simulator in which you do what you wish to do. The game progresses at your pace, and doesn't force you to progress until you are ready. If you want to build up your farm before progressing the story with those moving into the island you can, if you wish to keep your entire island in tents until you have everything set up exactly how you want, that is on you. We give you the tools to play the game how you wish to play it.

- Skeptishell

Pixacrea Island offers a lot of gameplay options for you to choose to do or to do them all, it is all up to you. Upon defeating a Pixacrea you collect their shards, with their shards you can turn them into the Science Lab so they can find differences in how not interacting with humans effects the Pixacrea, you can put them in your farm area to work such as gathering logs, mining ore, producing products for cooking, and so much more!

The game is very serious, and absolutely has ZERO references to anything else, nor does it have any Easter Eggs, whatsoever.

Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 (32bit/64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1280x768 or better Display
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Graphics: OpenGL ES 2.0 hardware driver support required for WebGL acceleration. (AMD Catalyst 10.9, nVidia 358.50), iOS 8.0, Android 4.4.4*

short_description: Starting your new job as a scientist you are required to visit an uninhabited island. Build your own paradise, discover & capture creatures to collect, and help build and shape the island with you. These creatures will help you gather resources so you can focus on crafting furniture, items and more!
